articles.title: Jammu and Kashmir cop shot dead by terrorists at his Pulwama home
articles.description: Sub-Inspector Farooq Ahmad Mir was shot dead by terrorists inside his home in Pulwama district of Jammu and Kashmir, officials said on Saturday.
articles.content: Sub-Inspector Farooq Ahmad Mir was shot dead by terrorists inside his home in Pulwama district of Jammu and Kashmir, officials said on Saturday.
